name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Call of Duty’s Simon Ghost Riley live wallpapers

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring intensity to Chrome with Call of Duty’s Simon Ghost Riley live wallpapers, plus a search bar and site shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring intensity to Chrome with Call of Duty’s Simon "Ghost" Riley live wallpapers, plus a search bar and site shortcuts.

Step into the battlefield with Call of Duty’s iconic Simon "Ghost" Riley Live Wallpaper extension! This Chrome add-on delivers powerful, high-definition live wallpapers of the legendary Ghost, setting a gritty, action-packed tone every time you open a new tab. For Call of Duty fans and military-game enthusiasts, these backgrounds capture Ghost’s intense focus and tactical edge, bringing the adrenaline of the mission straight to your screen.

Alongside the dynamic visuals, the extension includes an integrated Google search bar for easy browsing, plus customizable quick-access icons for your favorite sites. It combines the thrill of Call of Duty’s universe with seamless online functionality, letting you stay connected while keeping Ghost’s tactical presence in the background.

Designed for fans who love immersive, military-themed aesthetics, the Simon "Ghost" Riley Live Wallpaper extension enhances your browsing with an edge of intensity and adventure. Let Ghost lead your digital missions each time you open a new tab, making your online experience both powerful and functional!
